title: Service and Repair
description: Developed a comprehensive web application for the service and repair of vehicle tires, designed to streamline operations for both customers and service providers.Also ,This web application is built to sell and buy the different types of vehicle's tyre

title: Namaste Travel
description: Developed Namaste Travel , a dynamic web application aimed at enhancing the travel planning experience for users. The platform offers a user-friendly interface where travelers can explore destinations, receive personalized recommendations, and manage their itineraries.

title: Twitter Clone
description: Developed a fully functional Twitter clone web application, designed to emulate the core features of the Twitter platform. The project showcases proficiency in full-stack development, implementing a modern, responsive interface and robust backend services.
